title: Big City Blues
lyrics: I just wanna see you smile I just wanna make you mine We can spend time, smoke away the time We can go anywhere you ever wanted Anything you ever dreamed I can make your dreams come true I'll be on my own, no crew Out here makin' these moves I don't wanna think about you Every time I think about you I swear I fall in love again I remember everything you said Promise me it's real Girl, I got a deal You could be my girl if I could be your world Promise me it's real Girl, I got a deal You could be my girl if I could be your world Uh, uh, uh, uh, uh, uh Uh, uh, uh, uh, uh, uh And we can leave this club And we can get fucked up In the back of the Chevy Girl, I felt your heart beatin' heavy for me And I just wanna see you shine Girl, you got stars for eyes And she sweet like Texas tea With a ass from Tennessee And we can take the long way home 'Cause I don't wanna see you go Sitting drinkin' whiskey, hopin' that you miss me Baby, say you do (please say you do) Uh, uh, uh, uh, uh, uh Uh, uh, uh, uh, uh, uh
